name: Retro GC
description:
This is a simple endless runner game created for Tczewskie Retro Granie 2021 8-hours game jam. The main theme of the game is Grzegorz Ciechowski's song "Tak... Tak... To ja" - some platforms to jump on are only seen in the mirror of the river ;)

Since the jam was pretty short, I like the idea of refining this prototype soon. There is also an annoying bug - the player often jumps right into the water at game start.

Have fun!

Adam
